question: With which of the following neighbors India shares a land border of 4096.7 km ?
explanation: India has 15106.7 km of land border running through 92 districts in 17 states and a coastline of 7516.6 km touching 13 states and union territories.. India’s total number of islands is 1197 which accounts to a stretch of 2094 km additional border or coastline. The length is as follows: Bangladesh 4096.7 km China 3488 km Pakistan 3323 km Nepal 1751 km Myanmar 1643 km Bhutan 699 km Afghanistan 106 km
